verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Trump] [V: feuded] [ARG1: with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] and threatened to impose penalties on foreign automobile imports Saturday , capping an acrimonious meeting of the Group of Seven industrial nations that further frayed ties between the United States and its closest allies.</p >

< p > [ARG0: President Trump] feuded with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and [V: threatened] [ARG1: to impose penalties on foreign automobile imports Saturday] , [ARGM-ADV: capping an acrimonious meeting of the Group of Seven industrial nations that further frayed ties between the United States and its closest] allies.</p >

< p > [ARG0: President Trump] feuded with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and threatened to [V: impose] [ARG1: penalties on foreign automobile imports] Saturday , capping an acrimonious meeting of the Group of Seven industrial nations that further frayed ties between the United States and its closest allies.</p >

< p > [ARG0: President Trump] feuded with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and threatened to impose penalties on foreign automobile imports Saturday , [V: capping] [ARG1: an acrimonious meeting of the Group of Seven industrial nations that further frayed ties between the United States and its closest] allies.</p >

< p > President Trump feuded with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and threatened to impose penalties on foreign automobile imports Saturday , capping [ARG0: an acrimonious meeting of the Group of Seven industrial nations] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MNR: further] [V: frayed] [ARG1: ties between the United States and its closest] allies.</p >
